short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks for <meta name='theme-color'> and adds it if missing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Theme Color Checker is a simple Chrome extension that ensures every website you visit has a title bar in the right color. If a site doesn't have this it set, the extension automatically adds it using the background color of the page. This helps provide a more consistent look and feel, especially on mobile devices where the theme color can influence the browser's address bar color.
